It was great until they made the battle royale and made it free, the people who actually payed for it we're just given some badge that doesn't do anything and the ability to play with other people that have also payed. But that doesn't matter because you can get prime for free on the 21st rank i think. But you never use prime because you usually play with friends who got it for free. It is great that you can play with friends but usually in casual there are just russian kids ear raping everybody in the voice chat, and aimbotters, people with wall hacks, etc...

[h1] After approx 1500h in this s#ithole Im ready to write a review. [/h1]
First of all- since 2014 the game has only [b] gone down hill[/b]. Nothing changed for good in this game. Even the performance- i cant even imagine what the hell can lag in this 2012 "meh"-graphics game. But the "content" just cant stop flowing- [b] new skns, badges and other bulls#it [/b] stabily comes out every 1-2 months! Second- the gameplay feels just as it looks. The guns feel clunky, the sound they make makes me womit. Talking about sound- the positioning of [b] sound in this game is awful[/b]. On Nuke (fav map) you cant figure out which plant a man is, an upper orr lower one, while standing ON TOP OF LOWER and right NEXT TO UPPER one. 
The last straw for me was getting [b] VAC banned for NO REASON[/b]. Im the only man playing on this account, I have NEVER played with either a script or ESP, was kind and not rude in the chat (no ra*cism/se*xism). Just woke up one morning to "U got VAC banned lol" message. But my friend also got banned for obeying this game's rules, so dont think it wont come for you. The players in this game 90-95% toxic 17-20yo edgy virgins shouting "noooo you cant play autosniper!!!" while having 1/10 KDR or just baltant hackers.
Will I play this game more? Yeah, on second account, but with cheats. Its not fun to progress in this game, even with  friends! Not recomending this game, better stay away. [i] Have a grrreat day everyone! [/i]
